meanings.definition: A treatise or essay discussing a particular subject.
meanings.sent1: The professor assigned a tractate on ancient civilizations for our history class.
meanings.sent2: I found an interesting tractate on climate change at the library.
meanings.sent3: The tractate on gardening was so detailed, it made me want to plant a whole forest!
meanings.sent4: Her tractate on friendship was like a roadmap to building strong relationships.
meanings.sent5: The tractate on astronomy painted a vivid picture of the night sky.

meanings.definition: A section or chapter of a book or document.
meanings.sent1: In the last tractate of the novel, the mystery was finally solved.
meanings.sent2: I always get lost in the first tractate of the textbook.
meanings.sent3: The tractate on desserts made me crave sweets all day long.
meanings.sent4: The final tractate of the play brought the whole story together in a surprising way.
meanings.sent5: The tractate on birds was filled with colorful illustrations.
